PerfectNetExp.abs: key day 关键日khamsin 喀新风kite observation 风筝观测
...br>中文南厦可能来自(南下)。英语Emmet可能来自emit(发射)。法语Chamsin来自khamsin(坎辛风，中东地区的东南风)。德语Her来自hin und her(往返)。意大利语Torn来自tornare(返回)。西班牙.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Arabic ḳamsīn, from ḳamsūn fifty (being the approximate duration in days)

means.word_mean: 1. an oppressively hot southerly wind from the Sahara that blows across Egypt in the spring

auth_sentence.content: They are similar in origin to the khamsin winds of Egypt.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are similar in origin to the khamsin winds of Egypt.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are similar in origin to the khamsin winds of Egypt.

auth_sentence.content: These khamsin winds go under the Hebrew name sharav in Israel.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: These khamsin winds go under the Hebrew name sharav in Israel.

auth_sentence.content: Virtually any part of Egypt can experience such winds, and a severe khamsin is most unpleasant and even dangerous.
